column6: Peter Parker embarks upon a deadly mission into the Iron with an elite special forces team to retrieve essential materials for Project Bellcurve. Meanwhile, Tony Stark sends Jennifer Walters, the She-Hulk, to infiltrate the Blue in an effort to learn the truth about why the Civil War continues.
column8: | editor:Tom Brevoort | writer:Charles Soule | penciller:Leinil Francis Yu
